turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order two pizzas from Bella Luna, both of them media, two pizzas. I would like pepperoni, sausage, jalapeno. And that should be it. Both of them thick-crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i don't think i got your whole order. let's try this again. you said you want 2 medium pizzas, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, both thick crust, medium jalapeno, tomato.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken. And that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, to confirm, you'd like 2 medium pizzas both with thick crust and with jalapeno, chicken and tomato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been placed. the pizzas will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so That should be it for tonight. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you got it. take care.
